author: Special Correspondent
text:
The National Institute of Technology-T has signed a Memorandum of Understanding with PepsiCo India Private Holdings for promoting research.

It was signed a few days ago in New Delhi. As a sequence, D. Shivakumar, Chairman and Chief Executive Officer, Pepsico India, visited NIT-T on Tuesday.

S. Sundarrajan, Director, who had invited him, held a discussion with Mr. Shivakumar. Heads of various departments took part in it.

Making a power point presentation, Mr. Sundarrajan said the NIT had become a leading institutions of higher learning.

It had been focussing on institute-industry relationship so as to offer practical experience. It had taken several national and international projects.

In his brief message, Mr. Shivakumar said that practical experience would have an edge over theoretical knowledge. Hence, more focus should be made on providing avenues to give practical and real time experience.
title: NIT-T signs MoU with PepsiCo
